[:page:PageHeader][:toc:]
+ WIKIDPAD Words

WikidPad also recognizes a word as a WikiWord, if at least one lowercase letter
follows several (that is: more than one) uppercase letters.


++ Examples

	* ABCd
	* ACLs
	* ADSs
	* WIKIDPADWord


[:page:PageFooter][alias:WIKIDPADWords][short_hint:One or more UPPERCASE followed by on or more lowercase letters.]
